data.title: Self-Learning Braille Application For Visually Impaired People
data.meta_description:
Braille is vital to all visually impaired individuals and it’s the only system through which visually impaired children can learn to read and write, yet the rate of Braille literacy among visually impaired people belonging to developing countries including India is alarming low.The project describes a Arduino based Hardware Implementation of the Braille teaching device.It implements the presence of 
combination of six vibration motors which is operated using the input received from the Arduino.All the vibration motors are controlled using Relay.We believe that by implementing the designed Braille system in schools and homes, Braille literacy rate can be increased and visually impaired people can be employed and can fully participate in society.
data.text:
Abstract

Braille is vital to all visually impaired individuals and it’s the only system through which visually impaired children can learn to read and write, yet the rate of Braille literacy among visually impaired people belonging to developing countries including India is alarming low.The project describes a Arduino based Hardware Implementation of the Braille teaching device.It implements the presence of

combination of six vibration motors which is operated using the input received from the Arduino.All the vibration motors are controlled using Relay.We believe that by implementing the designed Braille system in schools and homes, Braille literacy rate can be increased and visually impaired people can be employed and can fully participate in society.
